item.description: Masking # Image Kernels # Problem Statement # Implement an image processing web app supporting different image kernels. Background # The use of Kernels also known as convolution matrices or masks is invaluable to image processing. Techniques such as blurring, edge detection, and sharpening all rely on kernels - small matrices of numbers to be applied across an image in order to process the image as a whole. They’re also used in machine learning for ‘feature extraction’, a technique for determining the most important portions of an image.
